column5: i missed that event last year. I'll trya and be there this year though

First? I did not edit my first comment. It still stands.  And I said what I had to say in an email to you already. I'm more brighter then you or your Tennesee guy will ever be.  Oh oh the business men and the greasy Americvans are ganging up on me!lol  Yes. I was going to comment on Hockey and take my leave of absence Azulu. Maybe until next year, when I troll for walleyes at Waubashene from Machedash to Georgian bay.
Hibernation date is now. Goodnight Johnny.
...and you speak gooder English too...
http://www.rense.com/general89/duct.htm  Duct tape.How did we live without it
That was posted earlier last year i believe Paul.... and I don't remember who but they did an incredible job on the repairs for sure Jacques
oh well iwasnt here last year
No worries just thought you should know I tried to search for the post and can't find it
Looks like it was an old Taylorcraft BC-12, so the duct tape was probably a good sub for the fabric.

one sigle layer of duct tape can withstand 60# of down pressure....so if you weigh a 180 pounds and stand on a three layer piece of duct tape ...it will not break...  now you have the silly facts of the Mythbusters...arent we all special now!!!  gotta run so i can catch up to the short bus....that left without me ...stoopid idiot bus driver...
Ya but how many ducks gave their lives for that tape?
Enough to make it fly again Gord !!
Just no way I would fly in the plane after that . Think I would like a little  resson  over  that tape.
You'd be surprised what I have fixed with duct tape and plastic tie straps. I keep them in my car at all times.
Hoax.....An a Old one at that
i dont even want to think about that
Duct tape is o.k. the real hero is Liquid Bandaide. That stuff will glue a cut finger shut in 30 seconds.  Art
Where do you get the Hoax data from. I actually know who owns this Super Cub, in Alaska, and the story is absolutely true..
You ought to try fixing stupid..Anyone that calls TG a idiot can't be the brightest bulb on the tree

Paul, my little Canadian friend....  Don't you know that if it's moves and it's not suppose to you Duct tape it......and if it doesn't move and it suppose to move you WD-40 it......since my son told me this I threw out everyone one of my tools and purchased a lot of Duct tape and WD-40...
If it moves and it startles me, I use a hammer.
Give a man a few rolls of duct tape,a can of WD40, and a Pop Riveter, and he can survive for months, nay, years, in the wild, Bob,......my little Americain buddy !!!
Mental note to self "make noise when sneaking up on Roy"  Art
Editted to be nice.
You didn't need to edit on my account. You edited your original comment which is good, your a little brighter than I gave you credit for.  Have a nice day
VERY debatable......  Bob, not Billy...
